Alison Hammond has issued an apology after swearing on ITV This Morning today. The Brummie TV star was on the show on Friday hosting with Dermot O'Leary. 
The pair were discussing car boot sales, wh… [+1240 chars]

articles.title: Fontaines DC – 'Skinty Fia' review: generational band grapples with heritage - NME
articles.description: On their third album, the five-piece ambitiously broaden their style, making for a breathtaking collection that’s like nothing they’ve ever done before
articles.content: Heavy is the head that wears the crown, goes the old adage, and, in the terms of the Irish elk that adorns the cover of Fontaines D.C.s third album Skinty Fia, that appears to be true. The animal was… [+4677 chars]
